feed.title: Penter Lab
feed.subtitle: Understanding cancer and immune cell interactions using large-scale single cell genomics approaches.

entry.title: Lena joining
entry.content: Welcome Lena in the Penter lab! Lena will work on biobanking, general lab management and the wet lab side.
entry.summary: Welcome Lena in the Penter lab! Lena will work on biobanking, general lab management and the wet lab side.

entry.title: Max-Eder Research Group funding from German Cancer Aid foundation (Deutsche Krebshilfe)

link.title: Max-Eder Research Group funding from German Cancer Aid foundation (Deutsche Krebshilfe)

entry.content: We are grateful for research funding from the German Cancer Aid Max-Eder Program that will provide us with a generous start-up package for the first 4 years. Prof. Dr. med. Florian Heidel (Hannover) will serve as mentor for the group - thank you!
entry.summary: We are grateful for research funding from the German Cancer Aid Max-Eder Program that will provide us with a generous start-up package for the first 4 years. Prof. Dr. med. Florian Heidel (Hannover) will serve as mentor for the group - thank you!

entry.title: Funding from BIH Charité Digital Clinician Scientist Program

link.title: Funding from BIH Charité Digital Clinician Scientist Program

entry.content:
We are grateful for research funding from the BIH Charité Digital Clinician Scientist Program that will provide Livius with 50% protected research time for a period of 3 years.
A big thank you to Prof. Dr. med. Frederik Damm and Prof. Dr. rer. nat. Nils Blüthgen for supporting the application!
entry.summary: We are grateful for research funding from the BIH Charité Digital Clinician Scientist Program that will provide Livius with 50% protected research time for a period of 3 years. A big thank you to Prof. Dr. med. Frederik Damm and Prof. Dr. rer. nat. Nils Blüthgen for supporting the application!
